name: Humongous Entertainment Game Save File
summary: Game file created and used by Humongous Entertainment games, such as Backyard Baseball and the Pajama Sam series; stores saved progress of your game; referenced by the game when continuing a saved game.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
